algorithm: The new algorithm will calculate the score for each bin by taking the product of the logarithm of the item size divided by the minimum remaining capacity, squared, and the exponential of the difference between the maximum capacity and the minimum remaining capacity divided by the natural logarithm of the maximum capacity, squared, raised to the power of the item size.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    min_capacity = np.min(bins)
    log_item = np.log(item)

    scores = (np.log(item) / min_capacity)**2 * np.exp(((max_capacity - min_capacity) / np.log(max_capacity))**2)**item

    return scores
